epic.name: CELESTIAL CLIP
epic.description: [Caduceus Blaster] has a 10% chance to fire an extra shot that doesn't consume additional ammo.

epic.name: ANGELIC ACROBATICS
epic.description: [Guardian Angell's cooldown starts as soon as you jump or crouch.

rare.name: AERODYNAMIC FEATHERS
rare.description: While affected by [Angelic Descent], continuously gain 10% Move Speed every Is up to 60%.

rare.name: ANGELEISURE WEAR
rare.description: While affected by [Angelic Descent] or [Guardian Angel], heal 3% of your Life every IS.

epic.name: BLESSED BOOSTERS
epic.description: Your launch velocity is increased by 25% when canceling [Guardian Angel] with crouch or jump.

powers.title: DISTORTION
powers.description: Allies boosted by [Caduceus Staff] gain Lifesteal.

powers.title: GLASS EXTRA FULL
powers.description: Healing from [Caduceus Staff] targeting full health allies is converted to Overhealth, up to 50.

powers.title: PROTECTIVE BEAM
powers.description: [Caduceus Staff] targets above 80% Life gain 10% Damage Reduction.

powers.title: SERENITY
powers.description: [Sympathetic Recovery] heals for 20% more and heals you even while you are healing a full health ally.

powers.title: THREADS OF FATE
powers.description: [Caduceus Staff] chains to your previous target for 3s, at 50% effectiveness.

powers.title: BATTLE MEDIC
powers.description: Every 1s your Staff is attached, [Caduceus Blaster] gains 4% Attack Speed (stacks 10 times) until you reload or swap to your Staff.

powers.title: EQUIVALENT EXCHANGE
powers.description: You have 3 charges of [Resurrect] with 33% reduced cast time, but their cooldowns only reset at the start of a round.

powers.title: FIRST RESPONDER
powers.description: When you [Resurrect] an ally, you both gain 250 Overhealth for 6s.

powers.title: THE WHAMBULANCE
powers.description: When [Guardian Angel] ends, heal your target for 4 Life for every 1m you traveled.

powers.title: TRIAGE UNIT
powers.description: When using [Guardian Angel] on allies below 50% Life, [Caduceus Staff] heals them 30% more for 3s.

powers.title: CREPUSCULAR CIRCLE
powers.description: While [Valkyrie] is active, the healing and damage boost of [Caduceus Staff] are automatically applied to nearby allies.
